member.name: ISyncMgrEventLinkUIOperation.Init
member.summary: Enables Sync Center to provide the event to link to so knows which event to operate upon.
member.param: A reference to the event ID that is being stored. This parameter is the same as what is returned from the method of the pEvent parameter.
A pointer to the object for to use. This is the event object that owns the link.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ISyncMgrEventLinkUIOperation
member.summary: Provides a method that is called when event links are clicked in the sync results folder.
